features: Five curve sensing blades with unique skin guards give a close shave, while helping to protect skin from irritation
Water activated moisturizing serum infused with marine extracts hydrates your skin through each shave
Specially shaped handle enables razor to be placed on flat surface, while keeping the cartridge head raised
Soft rubber handle with multiple grips provide the ultimate control
System technology in the convenience of a disposable razor
body.description: Schick hydro silk disposable razors are the only grooming products that give back moisture to your skin during shaving, leaving it feeling silky smooth. Five curve sensing blades with unique skin guards give a close shave, while helping to protect skin from irritation. Water activated moisturizing serum infused with marine extracts hydrates your skin through each shave. Specially shaped handle enables razor to be placed on flat surface, while keeping the cartridge head raised. Soft rubber handle with multiple grips provide the ultimate control.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My Go to razor for a gentle smooth shave. 👍 Must have!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the only razor I use. I've been using this kind for years. Works well and very affordable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I HAVE BEEN USING THESE FOR A DECADE
reviews.reviewText: I simply will not use another razor. These are hands down the best for everything. People that say men's razors are the best have obviously never tried these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Little Better Than Others I've Tried Recently
reviews.reviewText: Dislike: Where are the razors I grew up with in the 70s and still had until the last 10 years? I have to shave every other night with this one. The ones from years ago, I could shave every 3 days. You have to be very careful with those blades because THEY WERE SHARP!LIKE: I can shave every other day...sometimes. This one shaves closer than the last 5 different kind of razors I've tried.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Hands down the best razor ever!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars NO RAZOR BURN!!!
reviews.reviewText: If you get razor burn easy then please try these! Looked for years for a razor like this and finally found the perfect razor. My skin gets irritated so easy but these give me a perfect shave without irritation. Please never stop making this razor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent razor for women
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried to switch to a different razor, and it literally tore the skin off the back of my leg. Immediately switched back to this one. I’ve never found a better razor and now I’m convinced I never will. Excellent job at moisturizing, it leaves you so silky smooth.

I am very satisfied with these razors. They do a good job they give me a smooth result, and I have been using it for quite some time now without any problems. You can use it for a month and it will still have successful results without harming your skin. at least it has worked well for me. I recommend.

I have recently purchased these razors after owning 2 of the other razors Shick sells.These are by far my most favorite.The amount of time it takes to shave all my parts have decreased quite considerably and the closeness of the shave is as close as it can getI've also tried others from Shick's competitors and Schick offers the closest most comfortable and affordable razors that any woman OR man could use.My stubble takes much longer to sprout than the others too.I have sensitive skin and it seems as though I tend to develop a rash no matter the brand or amount of blades.These "sensitive" razors do not give me any razor bumps or embarrassing rashes.These are my new favorite and go to blades now.Thanks Schick!

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente producto y de buena calidad
reviews.reviewText: Excelente producto y de buena calidad

Schick hydro silk razors are my favourite, I've tried many other brands and these are always what works best for me. I like the handle and grip. Some razor handles can be slippery to hold and I don't get any cuts from these. Leaves my legs feeling smooth. Good quality. I have zero complaints.
